sentences.en: Antelopes live in Africa and Asia.
Domestic chickens are descended from jungle fowl of Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 家鸡是由东南亚原鸡演变而来的。

sentences.en: During the Soviet era and its immediate aftermath, the region was officially known as "Middle Asia and Kazakhstan".
sentences.cn: 在苏联时代和紧随其后的一段时期，该地区的官方名称为“中亚和哈萨克斯坦”。

sentences.en: Heath was acute in his assessment of Southeast Asia and the Middle East.
sentences.cn: 希思深刻地分析了东南亚和中东局势.

sentences.en: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.cn: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.en: It has become a cliche to describe Asia-Pacific as the world's most dynamic economic area.
sentences.cn: 亚太地区是世界上最具经济活力的地区这种话是老生常谈了。

sentences.en: Mr. Adams made a tour around East Asia last year.
sentences.cn: 亚当斯先生去年往东亚旅行了一次.

sentences.en: Much of Central Asia was appropriated by the tsars only in the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 中亚细亚的大部分地区只是到了十九世纪才被沙皇所吞并.

sentences.en: Our factory exports to Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 我厂向东南亚出口产品.

sentences.en: South Asia continues to be the most dynamic economic region in the world.
sentences.cn: 南亚仍然是世界上经济最活跃的地区。

sentences.en: That's good. We don't sell much in Southeastern Asia, do we?
sentences.cn: 这是好事. 我们在东南亚的销售并不多, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: The countries of South Asia also share many common values.
sentences.cn: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

sentences.en: The curtain must now rise on a widely different scene in Southeast Asia before the readers.
sentences.cn: 现在必须在读者面前展开东南亚的一幅迥然不同的画面.

sentences.en: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.cn: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.en: The range of this plant is East Asia.
sentences.cn: 这种植物的产地在东亚.

sentences.en: The security of all of southeast Asia will be endangered if Laos loses its neutral independence.
sentences.cn: 如果老挝失去了它中立立场的独立,整个东南亚的安全将受到威胁.

sentences.en: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.en: This transmitter will be beamed at East Asia.
sentences.cn: 这台发射机将用于对东亚广播.

sentences.en: We'd like to have them from Africa and Asia as well.
sentences.cn: “我们也希望有来自非洲和亚洲的小孩”。

trans.tran_en: the largest continent with 60% of the earth's population; it is joined to Europe on the west to form Eurasia; it is the site of some of the world's earliest civilizations
